sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_dict ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar2(32 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, dictmark number(4) not null, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(name) );

create table sf_dict_item ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), text varchar2(128 char) not null, codeno varchar2(128 char), itemmark number(4) not null, createDate timestamp, userid char(32), description varchar2(256 char), ext1 varchar2(64 char), ext2 number(11) not null, oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(dictid, codeno) );
